jd: From: Deepak, Xforia Inc deepak@xforia.com Reply to: deepak@xforia.com Title: Azure Cloud Native Solution ArchitectLocation: Atlanta, GA | Day 1 OnsiteDuration: 12+ Months Contract Job Description:Responsible for delivering platform architecture to support internal product development.Experienced in application architecture patterns, Azure cloud-native services, and emerging technologies (such as AI, ML, IoT, and blockchain) Shared Responsibilities:Architecture DesignTechnology SelectionAzure Platform as a Service (PaaS) offerings (Azure Functions, App Service, Eventgrid)Microservices architecture and containerization (Azure Kubernetes Service - AKS)Exposure to AI, ML, IoT, and blockchainData and SQL conceptsEnsuring scalability, performance, resiliency, and security of the solutionsEnforcing Enterprise Architecture (EA) guidelines and best practicesProviding guidance and direction to the implementation teamsReviewing implementations to ensure adherence to the architecture and guidelinesSupporting POC implementationsAssisting with estimations and planningCommunicating with stakeholdersIdentifying risks and implementing mitigations www.xforia.com Deepak M.VRecruitment Managero: (+1) 214-919-39509300 Wade Boulevard, Suite 220, Frisco TX 75035, USA.
